famous_recipes.method: To prepare biryani, first, soak 2 cups of basmati rice for 30 minutes, then cook the rice with whole spices and salt until it's 70% done. In a separate pan, cook the meat or vegetables with spices and yoghurt until tender. Layer the rice and meat mixture in a large pot, sprinkle with fried onions, mint leaves, and saffron-infused milk. Cover and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes until the rice is fully cooked and fluffy. Serve hot with raita or salad.
